www.theparkgame.com

Node.js, Jade, SASS, Grunt workflow

Design, develop, and deploy a content-rich landing page for The Park, a single-player video game by Funcom. Help build a game brand identity, informed by event-driven data collection.

Design and ship complimentary CRM materials. Use A/B test stategies to inform successful decisions.

Responsive
Modern full-width design
Event-driven analytics
Content Management System

anarchy-online.com

Node.js, Jade, SASS, Grunt workflow

Design, develop, and deploy a trial funnel for Anarchy Online, the longest-running science fiction MMORPG of all time. Update visual brand identity to showcase 14 years of lavish world-building.

An integrated Twitter feed allows Game Community Managers to feature and engage with players in a way that makes sense.

archive.anarchy-online.com

Python (Scrapy), NodeJS + Express

A legacy CMS left my client exposed to attacks. I scraped all web content & web tools into a static site, served via Express.

Fresh Visual Update
Consistent with 14 years of brand identity
Scrape legacy, end-of-life CMS into static archive

Custom RESTful CMS

Python (CherryPy + Mako), SASS

A custom fixed-width CMS to reboot the in-game help & knowledgebase system of The Secret World.

Drop-in stylesheets support a wide range of future products.

Simple inline WYSIWYG editing via Ckeditor allows contributors to easily update content.

Modular block-based templates support a variety of content-rich layouts. Drop-in localization strategy, designed to be highly extensible with SQLAlchemy.

Gameplay Design

Level Design, Narrative Building

Primary gameplay designer, content implementer, and scripter of 2014 Seasonal events/DLC in The Secret World.

Video game studios, like all small businesses, require flexibility. When Funcom's world class design team needed help shipping Holiday content, I rolled up my sleeves and dived in.

The Secret World is powered by Funcom's own Dreamworld Technology.
